nodes.text: The slaughter on Noult was a slaughter played out by the Alliance to Restore the Republic on the planet Noult during the Galactic Civil War. Soon after the slaughter happened, a secret base was discovered on Noult, proving that it was the Rebels who carried out the slaughter. The slaughter was later used by Senator Ransolm Casterfo as an example of the Rebel Alliance's so-called terrorist tactics.
